name: RainonAwning
0:
”Alexa open Rain on Awning”
”Alexa ask Rain on Awning to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain on awning
des:
Rain on Awning simulates the sound of rain falling on an awning, creating a sheltered and snug ambiance. The noise of rain on fabric overhead offers a sense of coziness and protection, perfect for creating a relaxed environment.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Rain on Awning
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
